name: Cyber Swarm Control
description:
To play, unzip the files and execute the GAMEJAM_strategie.exe 

Press any button on the D-Pad to start the first wave after character selection

This game was made for the 15th Creative Jam (Poly Games) in 46 hours. 

2 players team up in local multiplayer (with controllers) to fight back against a swarm of bug-like robots. Defend your ship, placing turrets and using unique abilities, until it loses all of its health or until you defeat all the foes! 

Your turrets and abilities lose efficiency as you play, forcing you to repair the turrets from time to time. 

Team Squad: 

  • Ariane Gravel-Villeneuve
  • Cassandra Paré
  • Emma Tremblay
  • Joël Tremblay
  • David Piché
  • Celtis de Chardon

You can: place turrets (Y on controller, then press B to place) and upgrade/interact with them (while close to turret, press RT to select a turret or wall, RT again will upgrade it if it can be upgraded by your class, LT will unselect)

Use abilities (X) - but beware, they get worse as you use them - and try to survive!
